1.title: Hack the tao
1.description: Hack the Tao is the first art game experience designed by the Italian artist duo, Hackatao, for The Sandbox Game

2.title: Shinytures: Finding The Lost Creatures
2.description: Shinytures: Finding The Lost Creatures it’s an adventure where you can get mesmerized by accomplishing the missions you are giving as a member of the spatial organization.

3.title: Viking Fjord
3.description: Enter into the Vikings atmosphere as a real explorer. Our players have been traveling back in time to experience Fjord´s life.

4.title: Dethrone
4.description: Dethrone is a fantasy RPG adventure game where the player’s mission is to restore order in the region by completing missions given by the mysterious sovereign.

5.title: Mushroom Mania
5.description: Mushroom Mania is a collect-a-thon platformer set in an oversized fantasy mushroom world.

6.title: Tombs of Treasures
6.description: Tombs of Treasures is an action platform-adventure walking simulator. In the game, the adventurer Liu Fogel arrives in the jungle to find the treasures.

7.title: Sweet village
7.description: This is Rex. Many legends were told by ancient yummy bears but certainly, nobody could answer how Rex got into this candy world. Who knows, maybe he ate too many candies and showed up here.

8.title: 3D Print your life
8.description: Have you ever tried a 3D printer? Based on the CNC concept (Computer Numerical Control) a 3D printer helps you to build solid objects. 3D printing has been around for several years but only in more recent years has it become more accessible for everyday people.

nft.description: Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) are virtual tokens minted on the blockchain for digital scarcity, security, and authenticity. They are unique, indivisible, and non-interchangeable - allowing true digital ownership of in-game assets.

header.description: The leading software that allows you to create, rig, and animate your own voxel-based NFTs. Sell them on The Sandbox's marketplace and discover a new world.

cards.1: 上载你的模型之前，您需要成为我们的创作者基金的艺术家。立即申请并加入沙盒：
cards.2: VoxEdit是唯一能够汇出资产到集市的软件。下载VoxEdit，浏览我们的教学并开始创作：
cards.3: 当您完成您的模型后，您可以跟随以下简单步骤汇出到集市：前往VoxEdit顶部菜单的File > 汇出 > 汇出到集市 > 选择缩图及填写你的模型资料。

1.title: 建模工具
1.description: 開動您的創造力吧！無論是初學者還是專業人士，任何人都可以通過我們強大的工具集和操作簡單的介面創作出驚豔的作品。

2.title: 動畫工具
2.description: 象素創作世界的變革者。通過我們的骨架系統，VoxEdit 讓您可以在我們簡單易用的關鍵幀模式中使用時間線操控和繪製動畫

3.title: NFT Maker
3.description: Sell, trade, and buy VoxEdit assets on The Sandbox's marketplace and monetize your creations. 95% of all transactions goes to you, the creator!

artists.title: 我们的艺术家正在进行哪些创作

0.text: “VoxEdit 給我留下了深刻的印象，因為這款軟體把建模工具和動畫系統全部融合到了一起。”
0.author: William Santacruz

1.text: “對於象素動畫藝術家來說，VoxEdit 是一個變革者，因為這是唯一一款具有骨骼控制和時間軸動畫功能的象素軟體。”
1.author: Alex Florez

2.text: “這款軟體體現了他們團隊出色的敬業水準。軟體中包含功能齊全的動畫系統，這一點凸顯了它的與眾不同！”
2.author: Zach Soares

3.text: “這是最簡單的象素動畫創作工具之一，它為初學者提供了一個好看又易用的介面。”
3.author: Nicolas Morrone

play.title: 跟从规则游玩！
play.text1: 能力越大，责任越大：最重要的事要时刻留意我们和投诉我们的限制！
play.text2: 预设的大小是32*32*32，在Sandbox的宇宙内它们被转译成一米，所以角色和物品都要已这个单位作为标准。我们不需要用尽每一部分，但32x32x32是一个一米立方最大可提供的内容。
play.text3: 角色创造：如果在游戏内人类角色平均身高为1.80米(5呎9吋)，跟据这个高度，我们应该用两个32x32x32来创做角色。

funding.title: 二百万美元创作者基金之简介
funding.subtitle: 我们希望帮助您使用我们的平台去创造、分享和出售你让人赞叹的体素作品。

cards.1: First, you'll sign up so we can evaluate your work, as we want to encourage the best voxel ASSETS
cards.2: Get paid for each asset you make AND get 100% of profits from each of your sales!
cards.3: Overall goal for the fund is to generate 10,000 voxel ASSETS for the game
cards.4: In addition to the grant, you'll be able to sell your creations to players when The Sandbox launches

funding.text: 这个计划只接受首1000名艺术家，所以请今天就注册以享受好处！

sandbox.title: What is "The Sandbox" (SAND)
sandbox.text1: The Sandbox is a virtual world where players can build, own, and monetize their gaming experiences on the Ethereum blockchain using the platform’s utility token SAND.Players can create digital assets in the form of Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), upload them to the marketplace, and integrate into games with Game Maker.
sandbox.text2: A LAND is a digital piece of real estate in The Sandbox metaverse that players can buy to build experiences on top of. Once player owns a piece of LAND, the player will be able to populate it with games and ASSETS. Multiple LANDs can be combined to form an ESTATE.
sandbox.text3: A total of 166,464 LANDs will ever be available, contained in a map that will form The Sandbox metaverse.
sandbox.text4: GEM and CATALYST defines the tier, scarcity, and attributes of ASSET. CATALYST adds empty sockets to the NFTs that can be filled with GEMs. The higher the quality of the CATALYST, the more sockets your ASSET will have.
sandbox.text5: Users can monetize their time on the platform, keeping 95% of SAND as revenue share by :

1.title: Selling ASSETS
1.description: Users can create and sell ASSETS on the marketplace as NFTs.

2.title: Owning a LAND
2.description: Buy a LAND in one of the LAND sales. Players can then rent them or populate them with content to increase the LAND's value.

3.title: Building Games on the Game Maker
3.description: Build and monetize games using the Game Maker on the LANDs that are owned by players.

sandbox.text6: Through the use of ERC-1776, The Sandbox allows platform users to initate transactions on the Ethereum blockchain while transaction gas fees are paid by the platform, optimizing overall user experience.
sandbox.text7: 50% of all SAND transaction volume, collected from LAND sales, Premium NFT sales, transaction fees and subscription services is going to the Foundation
sandbox.text8: The Foundation supports the ecosystem of The Sandbox, contributing to the growth of awareness about NFTs, Metaverse, and $SAND adoption.
sandbox.text9: The Foundation currently is involved with

foundation.1: Managing the Game Makers Fund and Creators Fund, offering grants to incentivize high quality content and game production in The Sandbox.
foundation.2: Funcing over 17 game projects, some of which have been unveiled to the public at https://www.sandbox.game/game/top
foundation.3: Distributing grants to 100 artists to produce NFTs, most of which can be seen at http://www.sandbox.game/shop
foundation.4: Supporting local community managers to grow awareness around the globe about The Sandbox, NFTs and blockchain gaming via our Community Rewards and Ambassadors program https://medium.com/sandbox-game/the-sandbox-ambassador-program-4f00bb5c9c24
foundation.5: Sponsoring prizes to the various contests organized by The Sandbox team (VoxEdit Contests and Game Jams) to stimulate the creativity of users around the world and get them to engage with the tools of our platform.
foundation.6: Supporting play-to-earn tournaments and cross-gaming with activities that encourage the broader adoption of SAND.

section1.title: Build, own and control your gaming destiny

paragraphs.1: The Sandbox is your chance to create a piece of gaming history. Join our extraordinary metaverse; own and monetize everything you build.
paragraphs.2: Our platform is based on the Ethereum blockchain and uses SAND as its primary utility token. You can use it to buy LAND, create digital assets, and upload them to trade in the marketplace. Or use your assets to create gaming experiences in The Sandbox Game Maker. It’s easy to do, and you don’t need coding experience.
paragraphs.3: When other players buy your assets or play your games, you earn SAND in return. It’s a brilliant, decentralized economy that rewards your participation.
paragraphs.4: If building and monetizing content is not your thing, you can explore the vast virtual world and see how others have developed their LAND. It’s engaging, fun, and ever-changing as our growing community continues to add exciting new characters, landscapes, and games.

paragraphs.1: The Sandbox metaverse is split into 166,464 LANDS, creative sandbox areas owned by you, the players. You can create and monetize online games on your land or rent it to someone else to publish their own creation. Each piece of LAND has a pre-defined default terrain, but you can modify this as you build your own content.

Three pillars of technology work together to support your user-generated content production (UGC). Everything you create on The Sandbox is your copyright, and that will always be provable beyond doubt thanks to the blockchain and smart contracts. The three integrated UGC products that you can access are:

list.1: Voxel editor to create voxel models, rig and animate them fast
list.2: Marketplace to view or trade assets to use on your LAND
list.3: Game Maker to build, share and monetize your online games

paragraphs.1: The Sandbox has already forged more than 50 partnerships with leading brands to develop crypto game content, including Shaun the Sheep, ATARI, and Square Enix, to name but a few. You will see these partners on the game map (see the main menu), alongside thousands of individual users planning their own content. There is plenty of real estate for newcomers.

SAND is the fundamental virtual currency for all of The Sandbox ecosystem’s transactions and interactions. It is a utility token built on the Ethereum blockchain that you can purchase with your e-wallet, much like any other cryptocurrency. There is a finite supply of 3,000,000,000 SAND. Owning it is not only fundamental to gameplay and The Sandbox economy, SAND also gives holders the right to vote on governance decisions for the platform. Click on SAND in the main menu to find out more.

Intrigued? Create your account from the main menu to begin exploring everything that The Sandbox blockchain game has to offer. See what other players like you have created. Become inspired, purchase SAND (the game’s money), buy LAND, and let your creative side take over. The Sandbox is only just beginning, and you can be part of the journey ahead.

theGame.title: 来这个宇宙尽情畅玩吧！
theGame.text: 准备好在这个想象力游戏宇宙中认识新的朋友吧：The Sandbox 即将开放

play.title: Play Millions of games
play.text: The Sandbox is one of the largest user-generated content game platform, offering a myriad of player-made gaming experiences that will immerse avatar into one the most social & multiplayer experience!

create.title: Create your own adventures
create.text: The Sandbox allows you to use thousands of voxel models made by the community: assemble them, create your own universe, invent stories ... and dive in with your friends! Create your maps, or discover other player’s worlds!

share.title: Share with other players
share.text: Import your models, create a map, invent stories, hide some secrets, place wildlife… and let people play in your world! Get inspired by the incredible diversity available on the ASSET store - and by what other players create.

play.title: 在这个宇宙里畅玩
play.text: The Sandbox 宇宙将成为最大的用户生成游戏内容平台，提供无数玩家制作的游戏体验。所有人都可以制作游戏，每个人都可以玩得很开心！

create.title: 制作和共建
create.text: 制作游戏时，您可以使用 VoxEdit 上由社区创建的数千个象素模型。组装这些模型，创建自己的宇宙，谱写自己的故事……和您的朋友们一起玩耍吧！

social.title: 社交！
social.text: 让自己沉浸在前所未有的多人社交体验之中！和您的朋友一起共建、管理、聊天和玩耍。邀请别人在您的世界中游玩！

earn.title: 边玩边赚
earn.text: 免费游戏并不稀奇……但借助 The Sandbox，您还能够通过自己创作的游戏赚钱！我们为玩家和创作者提供奖励模型，任何想要一边玩游戏一边获得实际奖励的人，都可以边游戏边赚钱。
earn.listTitle: 如何在 The Sandbox 中赚钱？

list.item01: 通过玩游戏获得奖励
list.item02: 通过制作游戏获得奖励
list.item03: 通过制作和出售资产获得奖励

list.item01: 设计和构建您的环境：把物品、建筑物和生物放在您的土地中。通过自定义它们的行为和添加游戏积木，打造终极游戏体验。
list.item02: 使用我们简单的拖拽级构建工具放置配有现成的趣味行为模板的实体
list.item03: 通过直观的可视脚本编辑器完善实体和物品
list.item04: 或编写自己的自定义脚本以创建更多独一无二的游戏体验交互
list.item05: 按下播放键即可看到你的创作动起来，之后您还可以根据自己的意愿分享或修改您的世界
list.item06: 在 The Sandbox 中，游戏规则由您来定！

list.item01: The Sandbox 是最大的由用户制作内容的游戏平台
list.item02: 发现大量玩家制作的游戏体验，包括社交和多人游戏体验！
list.item03: 畅游由数千体验和游戏组成的宇宙
list.item04: 参观著名游戏工作室、品牌和其他同伴的土地。
list.item05: 在出发探索宇宙前，选择或自定义您的头像
list.item06: 邀请朋友到您的土地，使用我们的共建功能一起赏心悦目的立体模型！
list.item07: 和其他玩家一起玩；在 PVP 战斗中挑战其他玩家或通过社交活动和他们一起聚会。
list.item08: 准备好开始社交吧！组织虚拟聚会，在您指定的地点上，邀请朋友，和访客们聊天。

list.item01: 使用您的 SAND 代币进行投票，参与管理 The Sandbox 宇宙未来的关键决策
list.item02: 所有人都可以对宇宙中分享的体验进行评分。最好的创作将被托管到 The Sandbox 保留区域，从而最大限度提高可见度，因此，请发挥您的想象力！
list.item03: 作为土地所有者，您可以向所有访客开放您的土地，也可将其设为私密。您可以组织比赛展示您的作品，也可以将您的空间租给其他创作者；这里有无限的创新和商业可能性。

list.item01: Better game feel and upgraded movements, capacity to wear a sword and use it to fight
list.item02: Your avatar is now a real ninja!

list.item01: The enemies detect you and will attack the avatar or other entities if set to it. They will also restore their health before attacking you again so be sure to be quick!
Create your mini-games setting victory or game over conditions, with a time limit, pickable items and reward -build some quests to improve your experience and share it to players

When starting your experience and deciding the size of your experiences, you can now pick a specific biome to thematize it (desert, snow, nature…) or even start with a flat tile to build from scratch -by popular demand
To offer new possibilities within the objective system (local save only)
To help you visualize in a glimpse your most precious assets in The Sandbox world
Behaviors upgrade for quicker interactions
list.item02: Live Sync to have a better flow between the Game Maker and the assets on the dashboard
list.item03: Terraforming tool preview and multiple selections to ease your building experience
list.item04: Save file size optimization and land loading improvement

item04.title: Closed Alpha v0.3
item04.subtitle: We’ve got a whole slew of changes for you in this release, including new features, combat changes, and UI revamps. Let’s take a look at what’s new:

list.item01: Create and Publish your maps and experiences in the Game Maker for everyone to see and play in the Experience Gallery.
list.item02: Visit our featured The Sandbox experiences created by our artists and designers.
list.item03: Play and Rate others’ experiences. Give a star to your favorite experiences.

list.item01: Presets allow you to create, configure, and store an asset with all its modified content, including logic parameters, all properties and values & child assets.
list.item02: Presets act as templates from which creators can create new preset instances in the Game Maker.

list.item01: Improved Jump and Dodge mechanics.
list.item02: Added an auto-targeting system to focus the Avatar attacks onto an enemy.
list.item04: Incoming attacks are now easier to identify through new enemy indicators.
list.item05: Added Heavy and Thrust attack types into the game.
list.item06: Added new VFX and animations for the Avatar, Enemies, and other entities.

list.item01: Improved UI on the Quest Tracker includes improved graphic assets and animations.
Improved enemy behaviors and pathfinding systems.
We’ve temporarily disabled 3x3 and 4x4 experiences as the team is working on resolving some issues related to them
list.item02: For experiences saved using previous versions, image thumbnails won’t load in the Experience Gallery until they are opened and saved in this new version.
list.item03: Victory condition shows all the quests at the same time.
list.item04: Some quests can't be completed when you do the tasks previous to talking to the person that gives them, possibly blocking the advancement.
list.item05: The Default Avatar when playing an experience without an Avatar asset doesn’t have the proper animations.

list.item01: We’ve added the possibility to select your own Avatar to play experiences in game.
list.item02: Users will be able to access the Avatar creator website, log into their accounts and select the Avatar they want to use to play and create experiences.
list.item03: Select from 28 different preset Avatars to use on the Game Maker.

list.item01: Added improvements on the flow and UI to make it more understandable for users on how to publish an experience into the Gallery.
list.item02: Added pop-ups and messages indicating possible errors users may encounter while publishing an experience.
list.item03: Added featured experiences published by the TSB team.

list.item01: Improved game stability and performance issues.
list.item02: Fixed some experiences not being able to be opened due to retrocompatibility issues.

list.item01: We’ve temporarily disabled 3x3 and 4x4 experiences as the team is working on resolving some issues related to them.
list.item02: For experiences saved using previous versions, image thumbnails won’t load in the Experience Gallery until they are opened and saved in this new version.
list.item03: Victory condition shows all the quests at the same time.
list.item04: Some quests can't be completed when you do the tasks previous to talking to the person that gives them, possibly blocking the advancement.

list.item01: We’ve implemented our first instance of Multiplayer gameplay into the game.
list.item02: Inside the Experience Gallery you’ll find an experience called “Social Park” which is featured on our list.
list.item03: Visiting the experience will enable Multiplayer mode, where you’ll be able to explore the experience and chat with other players.
list.item04: As this is a Social Hub, combat controls will be disabled.

found.subtitle: 我们希望帮助您使用我们的平台去创造、分享和出售你让人赞叹的体素作品。

principalList.item1: The Sandbox免费为您的创作取得大量曝光，是2019年最备受期待的其中一个PC线上游戏。
principalList.item2: 创造、分享并售卖您的体素作品给游戏开发者和玩家。
principalList.item3: 您拥有您的作品的所有权和版权。
principalList.item4: 在您操控下维持您的创作自由。
principalList.item5: 学习如何在以太坊区块链上创造和售卖非同质化代币。
principalList.item6: 成为我们创作者社区的一分子并一起建造新的游戏未来。

subtitle1List.item01: 首先，您需要注册，好让我们能够评估您的作品。
subtitle1List.item02: 由于我们希望鼓励更多优秀的体素创作，每个作品都会得到$10 - $1000的补助。
subtitle1List.item03: 这个基金的最终目的是为游戏创造10,000件体素资产。
subtitle1List.item04: 与此同时，您可以把您的创作在The Sandbox推出后售卖给玩家。

found.subtitle2: 这个计划只接受首1000名艺术家，所以请今天就注册以享受好处！

guideline1.title: 资格
guideline1.text: The Sandbox的创作者基金是一个支持所有人材的倡议，不分年龄、性别或国籍。

guideline2.title: 我们希望在您身上寻找什么

list.itm1: 创作者可以创作静态和动态的体素资产。
list.itm2: 创作者可以创作资产，让玩家投入游戏内的互动。
list.itm3: 创作者通过他们的作品展示艺术性和想象力。
list.itm4: 创作者致力与玩家和开发者组成可靠的工作伙伴，让他们购买和售卖他们的资产。
list.itm5: 创作者的资产不单受到视觉吸引度的评估，也要注意它们对玩家和开发者的可持续性。

guideline3.title: 版权所有
guideline3.text: 就您的内容，您保有所有权利和拥有权。我们不会对您的内容索取任何拥有权。

guideline4.title: 许可权
guideline4.text: 当您上载内容到The Sandbox的商店，你授权我们一个全球性、非专有、免版权费、永久、不可逆转、可开子牌照及可转让的牌照去使用、复制、公开展示、分发和适应﹙例如为了更好展示您的内容﹚、公开表演和在需要时翻译内容以对应用户提出的行动。

guideline5.title: 游戏内商店的曝光率
guideline5.text: 免费得到为期6个月的顶级曝光率，放置在The Sandbox商店的 ‘精选’ 位置。

guideline8.title: 物品参数
guideline8.text: 每一件提交到Sandbox的物品都会有以下的参数

guideline10.title: 伦理/动机
guideline10.text: 本基金的目标是协助和训练艺术家在区块链上以非同质化代币 (NFTs)发表你的体素创作，以及学习区块链科技的好处：

faq1.title: 递交申请表时我需要准备什么？
faq1.text: 你需要提供基本的个人资料，并将我们连结到你的网上账户。你可以在每一次申请时提供最多三张图片，但这并不是必要的。

faq2.title: 当我在网上申请时，我的资料是否保密？
faq2.text: Sandbox不会在没有你的同意下发放你的个人资料。

faq3.title: 我能否提交在之前项目或游戏中创造的物品？
faq3.text: 可以，只要你持有该物品的版权和你拥有在其他项目使用的完整牌照权。

faq4.title: 每件物品我能够获得多少补助？
faq4.text: 每件物品的补助从$10至多1000，视乎它的规模和复杂性。

faq5.title: 我可以提交多少件物品？

faq6.title: 我可以将我已从创作者基金获得补助的物品放到其他市场出售吗？
faq6.text: 可以，你保留对你的内容的所有权限和拥有权，你可以在其他市场上出售。我们只会要求非专属许可，以将你的内容刊登在Sandbox的市场内。

faq7.title: 总共有多少位艺术家可以从创作者基金获得补助？
faq7.text: 创作者基金会对合共1000位艺术家提供补助。

faq8.title: 我收到补助后会否失去该物品的版权？
faq8.text: 艺术家保留对你的内容的所有权限和拥有权。我们不会对你的内容索取任何拥有权。

faq9.title: 我上传到Sandbox的物品会有什么牌照权？
faq9.text: 当你的内容上载至Sandbox市场，你会授权一个全球性、非专属、免版权费、永久性、不可逆、可开子牌照及可转移的牌照，让Sandbox去使用、复制、公开展示、分发和调整(举例说，为了提供一个更好的示范)、公开运行、内容翻译以对应用户提出的行动。

principalSection.title: 体素艺术指引
principalSection.text: 这是一些想法和程序，形用如何从像素艺术转换成体素艺术。这并不代表是唯一做法，我们希望指引会给您一些想法去创造您自己的方法。

rulesSection.title: 跟从规则游玩！
rulesSection.text1: 能力越大，责任越大：最重要的事要时刻留意我们和投诉我们的限制！
rulesSection.text2: 预设的大小是32*32*32，在Sandbox的宇宙内它们被转译成一米，所以角色和物品都要已这个单位作为标准。我们不需要用尽每一部分，但32x32x32是一个一米立方最大可提供的内容。
rulesSection.text3: 角色创造：如果在游戏内人类角色平均身高为1.80米(5呎9吋)，跟据这个高度，我们应该用两个32x32x32来创做角色。

marketSection.title: 将你的物品准备好放上市场
marketSection.subtitle: 当你完成模型和纹理处理，准备将你的物品放进市场！

hintsSection.title: 提示及贴示
hintsSection.subtitle: 让我们从场景中留意一些重点

tip1.title: 内容
tip1.text: 增加整体的纹理的容量是很好的 - 不用过份增加，只需要在这里和那里加入商当的变化。

tip2.title: 纹理
tip2.text: 在制作纹理时，需要留意物品需要在一段距离外被看到。保持简单，如有需要，或许你可以加入一些磨蚀效果(湿度、黑角…)。

tip3.title: 假冒光线
tip3.text: 我发现在制作纹理时加一点光线(加上阴影和强调面)会有很大帮助。这些效果对整体影响不大，因为我们的渲染器已经有光影的处理。

tip1.title: 对角
tip1.text: 尝试保持对角线整齐，有相同数目和比例的方块

tip2.title: 大型全面规模
tip2.text: 任何加到地型方块的式样，都需要透过地图系统来添加。

tip3.title: 纹理 #2
tip3.text: 在建议的像数模版中的方格式样可以从此处复制出来，这样可以提升模型的凝聚性和可读性

tip1.title: 规模
tip1.text: 去决定任何怪物的大小时，最好的方法是从它的双眼入手：以单黑点作为瞳孔，在它底下的白点给一点卡通感觉，你已经掌到你的比例。

tip2.title: 这是否要让它动画化起来？
tip2.text: 在使用VoxEdit操作的时候，需要动画化的部分，和需要「连结」起来的不同模型不同的。

tip1.title: 规模
tip1.text: 比起其他大自然的物品，在制作树的模型很难保持简约。这棵被催残的树有散乱的树枝，但它应该有很多大树叶好令它看起来简单一点。

tip2.title: 内容
tip2.text: 再次，尝试给你的模型加一些单向光。快速加入一些细节如洞口和树根。

tip1.title: 特殊效果
tip1.text: 熔岩和水面应该由之后提及的地图系统处理

tip2.title: 内容
tip2.text: 再次，尝试给你的模型加一些单向光。快速加入一些细节如洞口和树根。

There will only ever be 166,464 LANDs available, which can be used to host games, build multiplayer experiences, create housing, or offer social experiences to the community

first.title: DISCOVER THE SANDBOX
first.paragraph1: The Sandbox is a virtual world where players can play, build, own, and monetize their virtual experiences. We empower artists, creators, and players to build the platform they always envisioned, providing the means to unleash your creativity.

second.title: BECOME A LAND OWNER
second.paragraph1: A LAND is a piece of The Sandbox metaverse, providing access to exclusive content as well as granting the possibility to monetize your own part of The Sandbox’s Metaverse. Build experiences, host events, invite friends.

third.title: WHY SAND?
third.paragraph1: $SAND is our main utility token that allows you to buy and sell LANDS and ASSETS in The Sandbox metaverse.

fourth.title: NFT
fourth.paragraph1: Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) are virtual tokens minted on the blockchain for digital scarcity, security, and authenticity. They are unique, indivisible, and non-interchangeable - allowing true digital ownership of in-game assets.

privacyPolicy.title: Bacasable Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.text1: GDPR – Privacy-By-Design and Record of Processing Activities
privacyPolicy.text2: We are committed to a lawful, fair and transparent processing of personal data, adhering to the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).This privacy policy documents our general privacy-by-design considerations (articles 5, 25 and 26 GDPR) and records our processing activities (article 30(1) GDPR). This privacy policy describes the type of information we may collect from you or that you may provide when you visit the website
privacyPolicy.text3: , all platforms and services offered thereon, and through our mobile applications (collectively, our “Website”) and our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting, and disclosing that information.
privacyPolicy.text4: Company name: BACASABLE Global Limited Address Unit 418, Level 4, Cyberport 1, 100 Cyberport Road, Hong Kong, Mail: privacy@sandbox.game
privacyPolicy.text5: * Not formally a DPO under the GDPR. Note that the below uses the “you” and “us” pronouns in paragraphs nrs. 1 o 11 to allow inclusion without modification in our information notices provided to data subjects.
privacyPolicy.text6: Our Website is not intended for children under 18 years of age. No one under age 18 may provide any personal information to or on the Website. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If you are under 18, do not use or provide any information on this Website or on or through any of its features/register on the Website, make any purchases through the Website, use any of the interactive or public comment features of this Website or provide any information about yourself to us, including your name, address, telephone number, email address, or any screen name or user name you may use. If we learn we have collected or received personal information from a child under 18 without verification of parental consent, we will delete that information. If you believe we might have any information from or about a child under 18, please contact us at privacy@sandbox.game.
privacyPolicy.text7: 1. We process the following (categories of) personal data When you play our games, interact with or participate in our gaming platforms, connect to a social networking site through our games, register an account, enter a promo code, or place an order, we process the following personal data:
privacyPolicy.text8: Your IP address, your SIM code, and the country where you are located. Your device type (for example, PC or Mac, iPhone 7, Samsung Galaxy S7) and operating system version.
privacyPolicy.text9: For analytics, most, when you installed and played the game, your progress throughout the game, and events that are connected to your game-play. We generally cannot identify you with this data, but treat it the same as personal data.
privacyPolicy.text10: 2. What (purposes) do we use the data for We use this personal data to perform analytics for our games and allow third-parties to sell, buy and deliver advertising in those games that display advertising. We use your IP address and SIM code to comply with legal obligations, specifically to comply with VAT reporting obligations
privacyPolicy.text11: We use social network data to show you personalized content and synchronise your online progression across multiple devices. For example, we might show a list with only your friends in it, or show your name or avatar on an in-game object.
privacyPolicy.text12: We use your email address that you provided when you signed up for our newsletter to send you the newsletter
privacyPolicy.text13: 3. What is our legal basis for the processing For both analytics and advertising we base the processing of personal data on the legitimate interest of TSBMV GLOBAL LTD. For analytics, this is our ability to analyze how players progress through our games to make them better, and to know our player-base on an aggregate level. For advertising, this is our ability to be able to off-set development costs and risk with advertising income. We also process your personal data for the legitimate business interest of complying with a legal obligation -- we are subject to certain legal requirements which may require us to process your personal data. We may also be obliged by law to disclose your personal data to a regulatory body or law enforcement agency. For the third-parties we use, their legitimate interest is to be able to offer us their services, and for advertising third-parties and advertisers to be able to show you advertising.
privacyPolicy.text14: 4. Where do we obtain the data from (sources) We obtain data from you (when you provide it directly through the Website) and from our third-party services providers:
privacyPolicy.text19: 5. How long and where do we store data We store the personal data that we collect for up to 5 years, and only aggregate data after that time. Aggregation data means that we can no longer look at data for individual players. We store the data with our third-party services provider, Amazon AWS. When a third-party service provider is a controller, they may keep data as well, either for a shorter or longer period.
privacyPolicy.text20: 6. What safeguards have we taken to protect data Taking into account the nature, scope, context and purpose of the processing, we have taken the following technical and organizational measures:
privacyPolicy.text21: · Access to our database and user accounts with third-party service providers is protected with access control.
privacyPolicy.text22: · Access to the database is limited, not all staff in our organization have full access.
privacyPolicy.text23: · Data sent from our games is encrypted in transit where technically possible. We do not actively monitor the security of our databases and need to rely on our processors to notify us of any data breaches.
privacyPolicy.text24: 7. Who we share data with We may disclose aggregated data and any information that does not identify an individual without restriction.
privacyPolicy.text25: We may also disclose personal information that we collect or you provide:
privacyPolicy.text27: To contractors, service providers, and other third parties we use to support our business.
privacyPolicy.text28: To a buyer or other successor in the event of a merger, reorganization, dissolution, or other transfer or sale of some or all of TSBMV Global Ltd.’s assets.
privacyPolicy.text29: To fulfill the purposes for which you provide it.
privacyPolicy.text30: For any other purpose disclosed by us when you provide the information.
privacyPolicy.text32: We share data with the following third-parties. These are either controllers, or processors acting on our behalf. We have linked to their respective policies and given a basic description of what they do:
privacyPolicy.text33: We may also disclose your personal information:
privacyPolicy.text34: To comply with any court order, law, or legal process, including to respond to any government or regulatory request.
privacyPolicy.text35: To enforce or apply our Terms of Use and other agreements, including for billing and collection purposes.
privacyPolicy.text36: If we believe disclosure is necessary or appropriate to protect the rights, property, or safety or TSBMV Global Ltd., our end users, or others.
privacyPolicy.text37: 8. Transfer of your personal data You should also know that your personal data may be transferred from your home country to third parties. If you are an EU resident, this could imply that we also transfer data to countries that do not offer an adequate level of protection for your personal data. When we transfer this data, we will do so only when we have put in place appropriate safeguards to protect your personal data. Please contact us to get a copy of the safeguards that we have put in place. Our contact details are at the end of this privacy policy.
privacyPolicy.text38: 9. Your Rights You have the right to request access to your personal data that we process. You also have the right to:
privacyPolicy.text39: Rectify incorrect personal data or erase it in certain circumstances.
privacyPolicy.text40: Restrict or object to the processing of your personal data.
privacyPolicy.text41: Receive your data so that you can use it elsewhere (data portability).
privacyPolicy.text42: If you wish to exercise any of the above rights, please send us an email at privacy@sandbox.game. You may also update your personal data in your profile on The Sandbox via the settings. Finally, you have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority. If you do not know who your supervisory authority is, please contact us and we will tell you.
privacyPolicy.text43: 10. How to contact us You can contact us with any questions you may have about the processing of your personal data or the use of cookies and similar technologies by us, or to exercise the above rights: Web: http://www.sandbox.game
privacyPolicy.text44: Address: Company name: BACASABLE Global Limited Address Unit 418, Level 4, Cyberport 1, 100 Cyberport Road, Hong Kong, Mail: privacy@sandbox.game
privacyPolicy.text45: 11. Version information: We last updated this notice on August 28, 2020. You can view it at

There will only ever be 1,000 passes available, create your account now to get your pass.

topInfos.title: The Sandbox
topInfos.paragraph: The Sandbox is a virtual world where players can build, own, and monetize their gaming experiences and assets inside an immense virtual world. The Sandbox offers a suite of tools, tailor-made to empower players to come together and create engaging experiences across the metaverse.

intro.title: The sandbox is very happy to release its first closed Alpha!
intro.description: Please remember the ecosystem is still work in progress so you might still find some fresh paint and bugs. Our main goals are to test our servers infrastructure, social management and user flow. Please help us improve the experience by providing feedback on our website in the Alpha section.
intro.subtitle: Have fun

alpha.title: Alpha Season
alpha.subtitle: How does it work, waht can we do and what do we earn? We tell you everything!

1.subtitle: OWN A LAND AND REGISTER TO THE LOTTERY

paragraphs.1: The Alpha Season is open for holders of the Season Pass NFT ticket.
paragraphs.2: Take part in the lottery to try to win one of the 1000 tickets available. To participate you just need to own a Land and to be registered. You don’t have a Land?
paragraphs.3: You haven’t won the lottery? The Season Pass is an NFT that can be traded on Opensea!

2.subtitle: WON A TICKET? PLAY THE ALPHA

paragraphs.1: Explore, Dance, Chat, Play and more activities await you.
paragraphs.2: During the 31 days of the Alpha Season, come and discover 15 extraordinary new experiences gradually released.
paragraphs.3: Meet other players and participate to Social Events which will take place regularly to win extra rewards.

paragraphs.1: Throughout the Alpha Season, explore the Metaverse to complete objectives and earn great rewards - 7 exclusive to the Alpha Season NFT and
paragraphs.3: The Alpha Season includes over nine hundred new NFTs! Everything you can see in the game can be purchased in the Sandbox Marketplace.

rewards.title: All about the rewards
rewards.paragraph: How does it work, what can we do and what do we earn? We tell you everything!

reward.title: Reward
reward.subtitle: +1.000 Sand
reward.paragraph1: The total price pool is 1M SAND!
reward.paragraph2: Each player can win up to 1,000 SAND. That is, there will be 1,000 winners!

explore.title: Explore our best levels
explore.subtitle: Everything you can see in the game can be purchased in the marketplace.

hub.paragraph: The Sandbox Hub is the central place of the Metaverse. You can find here a Gallery where many NTFs are exhibited, access portals to other experiences, a concert space as well as three areas inhabited by our factions: Oracles, Heroes and Scientists.

glitches.title: Glitches in the Metaverse
glitches.paragraph1: We don’t know yet what causes this, but you’ll frequently find Metaglitches, those little bits of other places of the Metaverse that spawn where they shouldn’t.
glitches.paragraph2: This is the opportunity to meet people and see NFTs that we don’t often meet!
